prompts: Create a playful Electric-type Pokemon with yellow fur and black stripes.
Imagine a small, energetic Pokemon that can generate electricity with its body.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a tiny creature with bunny-like ears and a thunderbolt tail.
Show me an adorable Pokemon that thrives in urban areas with a knack for mischief.
Generate a vibrant Electric-type Pokemon that loves to play in grassy meadows.
Make a Pokemon that has a round body and is always buzzing with energy.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a yellow mini monster with wheels on its arms.
